mapper.select: SELECT Distinct B.article_id, B.article_title, B.article_content, B.member_id, B.article_created_at, (SELECT count(*) FROM community_reply_tb as C WHERE B.article_id = C.article_id) AS comment_cnt, (SELECT count(*) FROM community_like_tb as L WHERE L.article_id = B.article_id) AS like_cnt FROM community_article_tb as B, community_reply_tb as C WHERE B.article_id IN (select C.article_id from community_reply_tb as C ) and B.article_id IN (select L.article_id from community_like_tb as L )
